media:group.media:title: Viewtiful Joe Commentary
media:group.media:description:
This video follows on from my Devil May Cry Commentary which I recommend watching first, link below. There are flashing lights in the opening cutscene which could be a problem for some viewers.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/matthewmatosis
